sentences.sContent: It smelled like gasoline and flowers mixed together.
sentences.sContent_eng: It smelled like gasoline and flowers mixed together.
sentences.sCn: “咦~~~~”难闻死了，像是汽油和花香混在一起。

sentences.sContent: This system traps the gasoline vapor escaping from the fuel tank and carburetor .
sentences.sContent_eng: This system traps the gasoline vapor escaping from the fuel tank and carburetor .
sentences.sCn: 这个系统能收集从燃油箱和化油器泄漏出来的汽油蒸气。

remMethod.val: gas(气体) + o + line(排队) → 人们排着队去加油 → 汽油

trans.tranOther: a liquid obtained from petroleum, used mainly for producing power in the engines of cars, trucks etc
